_comment: Teaching methods and correctness rules. Reflections are extracted to quick_reference/correctness_rules/methods then deleted.

questioning_levels.L4_relation: How A relates to B? Changes when X increases?
questioning_levels.L5_scenario: Works in scenario X? How to adapt?

verification_flow.support: Teach → Verify L1+L2+L3 (5 questions) → Find gaps → Supplement → Re-verify → Confirm → Record immediately → Next
verification_flow.core: Teach → Verify L1-L5 → Find gaps → Supplement → Re-verify → Confirm → Record immediately

methods.sufficiency_test: Does this info directly support core understanding? Yes→Keep, No→Remove
methods.reflection_lifecycle: Record → Extract to quick_reference/correctness_rules/methods → Delete from reflections array

correctness_rules.language: English for AI-only content (JSON, internal state), Chinese for MD notes (student reads)
correctness_rules.verification_consistency: Every support knowledge needs L1+L2+L3 verification (5 questions), don't skip even if concept seems simple
correctness_rules.recording_granularity: Track sub-question completion in learning-state.json with English keys (e.g., throughput, matching_latency), delete sub-questions when hook question completed
correctness_rules.recording_timing: Record immediately after each support knowledge verification, don't wait until session end
correctness_rules.workflow: Student raises issue → Restate understanding → Share doubts → Student confirms → Record to reflections → Extract to rules → Delete reflection → Apply changes
correctness_rules.archive_trigger: When all hook questions of a document completed, archive to progress/archive/ with hooks_progress and concepts_progress only
correctness_rules.obsidian_format: Use '- + Tab' indentation for hierarchy (not ####), no tables (convert to text), maintain consistency with existing content format
correctness_rules.hook_question_overlap: When hook questions overlap (e.g., Q4 performance view, Q5 architecture view), identify unique parts: only teach unique content, reference previous questions for overlaps, verify only unique understanding (3-5 questions for L1+L2+L3)
correctness_rules.hook_question_decomposition: Always decompose hook question first to identify if support knowledge is needed, don't assume every hook question needs new teaching
correctness_rules.student_insights_recording: Record student's valuable personal insights (not just verify correctness): 1) Identify insights that are student's own understanding, 2) Reorganize with accurate terminology while preserving core viewpoint, 3) Confirm with student before recording to notes
correctness_rules.teaching_reflection: When student answers incorrectly/inaccurately or expresses confusion, reflect on teaching method: 1) Missing key concepts? 2) Inappropriate analogy? 3) Wrong explanation order? 4) Need more examples? Record reflection to reflections array

during_questioning: Verify L1+L2+L3 after each support (5 questions, keep consistent)
after_verification: Record immediately to learning document (taught content + key points)
Update learning-state.json progress (sub-question level, English keys)
